title: Join the Polkadot Hackathon
html: Put your skills to work at Polkadot Hackathon: North America Edition. The 6-week virtual program offers technical workshops, mentorship, a prize pool of over $600,000, and an in-person Hacker House in NYC! Register now

title: Use our StackExchange
html: Have a question related to something you're building with Substrate? Check out our Stack Exchange — your question may already be answered. If it isn't, have a look at what makes a good question and ask it ðŸ˜€.

title: Tell us more about yourself
html:
We want to get a clearer picture of the smart contract builders and enthusiasts in the Substrate and Polkadot ecosystem in order to better address their needs.

That is why we would like you to take a few minutes to answer few questions so we can make our products better.

Take quick survey
